#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
        int hole; 
        scanf("%d",&hole);   
        if(hole==0) 
                printf("1");
        else if(hole==1)
                printf("0");
        else {
                while(hole>0) {
                if(hole%2==0) {
                        printf("8");
                        hole-=2;
                }
                else {
                        printf("4");
                        hole-=1;
                }
                }
        }
        printf("\n");
        return 0; 
}
